title: How to turn new users into customers?
intro: A proper onboarding is key to user activation. Mozza helped Frichti set the right strategy and UX for their application in order to engage their users on day 1.
context:
Frichti is one of the French leading food-delivery startup.

Thanks to the quality of its food and marketing strategy, the company raised 43m€ in funding from the best VCs to compete with Uber Eats and Deliveroo. Such funding enabled them to invest significantly on paid acquisition; but acquisition is worthless if users don’t convert into customers. How to engage new users into ordering food on their 1st day with the app? We got our challenge.

title: Rethinking user experience to increase revenue.
intro: UX can have a direct impact on a company’s revenue. Bandsintown hired Mozza to redesign their promoters’ experience and boost the average order value.
context:
The platform where music artists and fans connect.

The New-York company counts more than 55m users that get recommended shows based in their music DNA. It makes revenue through tools for artists’ promoters to manage and market live events. Our job was to redesign these tools, and increase order value.
